text: chtoby ya vershil dobryye deyaniya svoim ostavlennym imushchestvom i vozmestil imi vremya, poteryannoye mnoyu v suyete". No yego pros'ba ne budet prinyata. Eto - lish' bespoleznyye slova, na kotoryye yemu ne budet otveta. Dazhe yesli by yego pros'by i slova byli prinyaty, on vso ravno by ne sdelal togo, o chom on prosit. On nikogda ne vernotsya v prezhnyuyu zhizn'. Ved' smert' yavlyayetsya pregradoy mezhdu nevernymi i tem, chego oni zhelayut, do togo Dnya, kogda Allakh ikh voskresit
